class Solution {
public int reverse(int x) {
int rev = 0;
while (x != 0) {
int pop = x % 10;
x /= 10;
if (rev > Integer.MAX_VALUE/10 || (rev == Integer.MAX_VALUE / 10 && pop > Integer.MAX_VALUE % 10)) return 0;
if (rev < Integer.MIN_VALUE/10 || (rev == Integer.MIN_VALUE / 10 && pop < -Integer.MAX_VALUE % 10)) return 0;
rev = rev * 10 + pop;
}
return rev;
}
}

public static int myAtoi(String str) {
String trim = str.trim();
if(str.length() == 0 || trim.length() == 0) {
return 0;

int indexOf = trim.indexOf(â€œ â€œ);

private static int getNumber(String trim, int indexOf) {

int sign = 1;

if(trim.charAt(0) == â€˜-â€˜ ){

flag = true;
}

     }else {         return 0;     }     char[] charArray = trim.toCharArray();     for(int i=1;i< charArray.length;i++) {         if(charArray[i]>='0' && charArray[i]<='9') {             if(charArray[i] == '0') {                 if(buffer.length()>0 && buffer.charAt(0)>'0') {                     buffer.append(charArray[i]);                 }             }else {                 buffer.append(charArray[i]);             }         }else {             break;         }     }     if(buffer.length()>10) {         if(flag) {             return Integer.MAX_VALUE;         }else {             return Integer.MIN_VALUE;         }     }     if(buffer.length() == 0) {         return 0;     }     if(buffer.length() == 10) {        String str = new String(buffer);        Integer consult = Integer.valueOf(str.substring(0, 9));        Integer residue = Integer.valueOf(str.substring(9, 10));        System.out.println(consult);        System.out.println(residue);         if(consult>Integer.MAX_VALUE/10) {             if(flag) {                 return Integer.MAX_VALUE;             } else {                 return Integer.MIN_VALUE;             }         }else if(consult == Integer.MAX_VALUE/10) {             if(residue <= Integer.MAX_VALUE%10) {                 System.out.println(Integer.valueOf(new String(buffer))*sign);                 return Integer.valueOf(new String(buffer))*sign;             } else {                 if(flag) {                     return Integer.MAX_VALUE;                 } else {                     return Integer.MIN_VALUE;                 }             }         } else {             return Integer.valueOf(new String(buffer))*sign;         }     }    return Integer.valueOf(new String(buffer))*sign;}

public boolean isPalindrome(int x) {
if(x<0)
return false;
boolean rlt = false;
int rev = 0;
int n = x;
while (n != 0) {
int pop = n % 10;
n /= 10;
if (rev > Integer.MAX_VALUE/10 || (rev == Integer.MAX_VALUE / 10 && pop > Integer.MAX_VALUE % 10)) return false;
if (rev < Integer.MIN_VALUE/10 || (rev == Integer.MIN_VALUE / 10 && pop < -Integer.MAX_VALUE % 10)) return false;
rev = rev * 10 + pop;
}
if(rev == x)
rlt = true;
return rlt;
}

public static int romanToInt(String s) {    int num = 0;    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++) {        char charAt = s.charAt(i);        switch(charAt) {        case 'I':    num += 1;    break;        case 'V':    num += 5;    break;        case 'X':    num += 10;    break;        case 'L':   num += 50;    break;        case 'C':    num += 100;    break;        case 'D':    num += 500;    break;        case 'M':    num += 1000;    break;        default:    break;        }        //å…­ç§ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µ        if(i != 0) {            if(( s.charAt(i) == 'V' || s.charAt(i) == 'X') &&s.charAt(i-1) == 'I' ) {                num -= 1*2; //*2æ˜¯å› ä¸ºï¼ˆi-1ï¼‰çš„å€¼ä¹‹å‰åŠ äº†ä¸€é            }            if(( s.charAt(i) == 'L' || s.charAt(i) == 'C') &&s.charAt(i-1) == 'X' ) {                num -= 10*2;            }            if(( s.charAt(i) == 'D' || s.charAt(i) == 'M') &&s.charAt(i-1) == 'C' ) {                num -= 100*2;            }        }    }    return num;}

public static String longestCommonPrefix(String[] strs) {
if(strs == null || strs.length == 0) {
return â€œâ€;
}
//æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€çŸ­çš„é‚£ä¸ªä¸²
int minLen = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
for (String string : strs) {
minLen = Math.min(minLen, string.length());
}
int low = 1;
int hight = minLen;
while(low<= hight) {
int middle = (low+hight)/2;
if(isLongStr(strs,middle)){
low = middle +1;
}else {
hight = middle-1;
}
}
return strs[0].substring(0, (low+hight)/2);
}

    class Solution {
    public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {

    ListNode newNode = new ListNode(0);ListNode cur = newNode;while(l1 != null && l2 != null) {    if(l1.val<l2.val) {        cur.next = l1;        cur = cur.next;        l1 = l1.next;    }else {        cur.next = l2;        cur = cur.next;        l2 = l2.next;    }

}

class Solution {
public int strStr(String haystack, String needle) {
if(needle.length() == 0 && haystack.length() != 0) {
return 0;
}
if(haystack.equals(needle)) {
return 0;
}
int[] next = getNext(needle);
int i=0;
int j=0;
while(i<haystack.length() && j<needle.length()) {
if(-1 == j || haystack.charAt(i) == needle.charAt(j)) {
i++;
j++;
}else {
j = next[j];
}
}
if(j>= needle.length()) {
return i-j;
}else {
return -1;
}
}
public int[] getNext(String needle) {
int[] next = new int[needle.length()];
next[0] = -1;
int i = 0;
int j = -1;
String[] T = needle.split(â€œâ€);
while(i<T.length-1) {
if(-1 == j || T[i].equals(T[j])) {
i++;
j++;
if(T[i] != T[j]) {
next[i] = j;
}else {
next[i] = next[j];
}
}else {
j = next[j];
}
}
return next;
}
}

j++;

j = 0;
}
if(j == T.length) {
return i-T.length;

/**

  * æ¥é›¨æ°´  * @param height  * @return  */ public static int trap(int[] height) {     if(height == null || height.length == 0) {         return 0;     }    int max = 0;    int maxIndex = 0;   //éå†æ•°ç»„æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€é«˜ç‚¹    for(int i=0;i<height.length;i++) {        if(height[i]>max) {            maxIndex = i;            max = height[i];        }    }    int left = 0,right = 0;    //ä»å·¦å‘å³éå†è‡³æœ€é«˜ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿”å›ç§¯æ°´å’Œ    if(maxIndex>0) {        left = countWaterLeft(0, maxIndex, height);    }    //ä»å³å‘å·¦éå†è‡³æœ€é«˜ç‚¹ï¼Œè¿”å›ç§¯æ°´å’Œ    if(maxIndex<height.length-1) {        right = countWaterRight(maxIndex, height.length-1, height);    }    max = left+right;    return max;  }public static int countWaterRight(int maxIndex, int length, int[] height) {    int res = 0;    int[] result = new int[length - maxIndex];    int j=result.length-2;    //height: 0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1     //result:               [2,2,2,1]    result[result.length-1] = height[length];    for(int i=length-1;i>maxIndex;i--) {        result[j] = Math.max(result[j+1], height[i]);        res += Math.abs((result[j]-height[i]));        j--;    }    return res;}

class Solution {
public int trap(int[] height) {
if(height.length<3){
return 0;
}
return find(height,0,height.length-1);
}
public int find(int[] height,int start,int end){
if(end-start<2){//é€’å½’çš„ç»ˆç‚¹
return 0;
}
int max=-1,tmp=-1,min_two=Math.min(height[start],height[end]),sum=0;;
for(int i=start+1;i<end;i++){
//è¿™ä¸€å¥å†™åœ¨å“ªé‡Œéƒ½è¡Œ
sum=sum+(min_two-height[i]);
if(height[i]>max){
max=height[i];
tmp=i;
}
}

    if(max<min_two){//ä¸Šé¢çš„åŠ æ³•å…¶å®åº”è¯¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œï¼Œè½¬ç§»åˆ°ä¸Šé¢å’Œåœ¨è¿™é‡Œå…¶å®éƒ½ä¸€æ ·        //sum=sum+(min_two-height[i]);        return sum;    }else{//å…¶å®è¿™é‡Œè¿˜å¯ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–ä¸€ä¸‹å½“ä¸­é—´çš„maxå€¼ç­‰äºstartæˆ–è€…endçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå½“å®ƒç­‰äºstart,é‚£ä¹ˆç›´æ¥è®¡ç®—å³å¯ï¼Œä¸ç”¨è¿›è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡é€’å½’ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡é€’å½’ä¼šå†æ‰«æä¸€é        return find(height,start,tmp)+find(height,tmp,end);    }}

}

class Solution{
public List<List> levelOrder(TreeNode root){
List<List> rlt = new ArrayList<List>();
if(root != null){
return rlt;
}
Queue queue = new LinkedList();
queue.offer(root);
while(!quque.isEmpty()){
List list = new ArrayList();
int count = queue.size();
while(count>0){
TreeNode node = queue.poll();
list.add(node.val);
if(node.left != null){
queue.offer(node.left);
}
if(node.right != null){
queue.offer(node.right);
}
}
rlt.add(list);
}
return rlt;
}
}

class Solution{
public List preorderTraversal(TreeNode root){
List list = new ArrayList();
if(root == null)
return list;
}
Stack stack = new Stack();
stack.push(root);
while(!stack.isEmpty()){
TreeNode node = stack.pop();
list.add(node.val);
if(node.right != null){
stack.push(node.right);
}
if(node.left != null){
stack.push(node.left);
}
}
return list;
}

class Solution{
public int singleNumber(int[] nums){
int result = nums[0];
for(int i=1;i<nums.length;i++){
result = nums[i]^result;
}
return result;
}
}

package timejjc.com.queue;

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class LoopQueue {

private Object[] data;private int rear;private int front;private int maxSize = 10;private static final int INCREAT = 10;//æ¯æ¬¡å¢é•¿10ç©ºé—´public LoopQueue(){    this.rear = 0;    this.front = 0;    this.data = new Object[maxSize];}public boolean isEmpty() {    if(rear == front) {        return true;     }    return false;}public boolean isFill() {    if((rear+1)%maxSize == front) {        return true;    }    return false;}/** * è·å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´  * @param n */public Object queueFront(Object n ) {    if(isEmpty()) {        return null;    }    return  data[(front+1)%maxSize];}public void enQueue(Object n) {    if(isFill()) {        System.out.println("Queue is Fill");    } else {        rear = (rear+1)%maxSize;        data[rear] = n;    }}public Object deQueue(){    if(isEmpty()) {        return null;    }     return queueFront(front);}public static void main(String[] args) {    LoopQueue<Integer> lq = new LoopQueue<Integer>();    lq.enQueue(1);    lq.enQueue(2);    lq.enQueue(3);    lq.enQueue(4);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(5);    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//1}

}

package timejjc.com.queue;
/**

  • å¾ªç¯é˜Ÿåˆ—â€“é›†åˆä¸éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿæ»¡ï¼Œä½†éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ˜¯åŸå¢“
  • @author æ¢ç¿ ç¿ 
    /

import java.util.ArrayList;

public class LoopQueue {

private ArrayList<T> data = new ArrayList<T>();private int rear;private int front;public LoopQueue(){    this.rear = 0;    this.front = 0;}public boolean isEmpty() {    if(rear == front) {        return true;     }    return false;}/** * è·å–é˜Ÿå¤´å…ƒç´  * @param n */public T queueFront() {    if(isEmpty()) {        return null;    }    T item = data.get(front%data.size());    front = (front+1)%data.size();    return  item;}public void enQueue(T n) {    if(data.size() == 0) {        rear = rear+1;    } else {        rear = (rear+1)%data.size();    }    data.add(n);}public Object deQueue(){    if(isEmpty()) {        return null;    }     return queueFront();}public static void main(String[] args) {    LoopQueue<Integer> lq = new LoopQueue<Integer>();    lq.enQueue(1);    lq.enQueue(2);    lq.enQueue(3);    lq.enQueue(4);    lq.enQueue(5);    lq.enQueue(6);    lq.enQueue(7);    lq.enQueue(8);    lq.enQueue(9);    lq.enQueue(10);    lq.enQueue(11);    lq.enQueue(12);    lq.enQueue(13);    lq.enQueue(14);    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//1    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//2    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//3    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//4    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//5    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//6    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//7    System.out.println(lq.deQueue());//8}

}
